trans-unit.source: Represents a utility class that can retrieve security tokens or keys when you have a key identifier or key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个实用工具类，可以在您具有密钥标识符或密钥标识符子句时检索安全令牌或密钥。

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityTokenResolver class to retrieve a key or security token when you have a key identifier or key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SecurityTokenResolver 类来检索键或安全令牌，当您具有密钥标识符或密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> methods retrieve a token given that there is a key identifier or key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>方法假定没有密钥标识符或密钥标识符子句检索令牌。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A> retrieve a key given that there is a key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A>假设没有密钥标识符子句检索密钥。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods with a `Try` prefix return `false` when the retrieval is unsuccessful, whereas the methods without a `Try` prefix throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 将方法`Try`前缀返回`false`时检索不成功，而不带方法`Try`前缀引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default security token resolver for the specified security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 创建默认安全令牌解析程序为指定的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The security token resolver that is returned from this method, uses the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ResolveKeyIdentifierClause%2A> methods on the specified security tokens to resolve key identifiers and key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: 此方法，从返回的安全令牌解析使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ResolveKeyIdentifierClause%2A>上指定的安全令牌，以解析密钥标识符和密钥标识符子句的方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ResolveKeyIdentifierClause%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that contains the set of security tokens for which this security token resolver can resolve key identifiers and key identifier clauses to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>类型的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，包含此安全令牌解析程序可以为其解析密钥标识符和密钥标识符子句的安全令牌集。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to resolve the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<SecurityTokenReference>" name="<SecurityTokenReference>" href=""></xref> key identifier clauses that reference a security key that is located somewhere else in the SOAP message; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要解决<xref uid="langword_csharp_<SecurityTokenReference>" name="<SecurityTokenReference>" href=""></xref>密钥引用某个位置中的 SOAP 消息的其他; 否则为位于的安全密钥标识符子句<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A that resolves key identifiers and clauses that match the security tokens specified in the tokens parameter.
trans-unit.target: A 可解析密钥标识符和匹配中指定的安全令牌的子句 tokens 参数。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，则从 XML 加载自定义配置。

trans-unit.source: By default, throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将引发一种<xref:System.NotImplementedException>。</xref:System.NotImplementedException>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to provide functionality in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法以提供派生类中的功能。

trans-unit.source: The custom configuration elements.
trans-unit.target: 自定义配置元素中。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the key that is referenced in the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的密钥标识符子句中引用的键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A> and ResolveSecurityKey methods differ in what happens when the key identifier clause cannot be resolved to a key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A>和 ResolveSecurityKey 方法中的密钥标识符子句不能解析为密钥时，会发生什么情况的行为有所不同。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A> method returns `false`, whereas the ResolveSecurityKey method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A>方法返回`false`，而 ResolveSecurityKey 方法引发异常。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to retrieve the key for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>若要检索的密钥。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref> that is the key referenced in the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"> </xref> ，它是在指定的密钥标识符子句中引用的密钥。

trans-unit.source: keyIdentifierClause is .
trans-unit.target: keyIdentifierClauseis .

trans-unit.source: A key could not be retrieved for the key identifier clause specified in the keyIdentifierClause parameter.
trans-unit.target: 无法为中指定的密钥标识符子句检索密钥 keyIdentifierClause 参数。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a security token that matches one of the security key identifier clauses contained within the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定的密钥标识符中包含的安全密钥标识符子句之一相匹配的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> and ResolveToken methods differ in what happens when the key identifier cannot be resolved to a security token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>和 ResolveToken 方法中的密钥标识符不能解析为安全令牌时，会发生什么情况的行为有所不同。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> method returns `false`, whereas the ResolveToken method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>方法返回`false`，而 ResolveToken 方法引发异常。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> to create a security token for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref>若要创建安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，它表示指定的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: keyIdentifier is .
trans-unit.target: keyIdentifieris .

trans-unit.source: A security token cannot be created for the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 无法为指定的密钥标识符创建安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the security token that matches the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定的密钥标识符子句相匹配的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> and ResolveToken methods differ in what happens when the key identifier clause cannot be resolved to a security token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>和 ResolveToken 方法的行为有所不同无法将密钥标识符子句解析为安全令牌时，会发生什么情况。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> method returns `false`, whereas the ResolveToken method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>方法返回`false`，而 ResolveToken 方法引发异常。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to create a security token for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>若要创建安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，它表示指定的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to retrieve the key that is referenced in the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 尝试检索在指定的密钥标识符子句中引用的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The TryResolveSecurityKey and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A> methods differ in what happens when the key identifier clause cannot be resolved to a key.
trans-unit.target: TryResolveSecurityKey 和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A>方法中的密钥标识符子句不能解析为密钥时，会发生什么情况的行为有所不同。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TryResolveSecurityKey method returns `false`, whereas the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: TryResolveSecurityKey 方法返回`false`，而<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A>方法引发异常。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to retrieve the key for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>若要检索的密钥。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref> that contains the key that is referenced in the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"> </xref> ，其中包含指定的密钥标识符子句中引用密钥。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数传递时未经初始化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when a key can be retrieved for the specified key identifier clause; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>当检索指定的密钥标识符子句中; 密钥否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: keyIdentifierClause is .
trans-unit.target: keyIdentifierClauseis .

trans-unit.source: Attempts to retrieve the key that is referenced in the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 尝试检索在指定的密钥标识符子句中引用的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The TryResolveSecurityKeyCore method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 调用 TryResolveSecurityKeyCore 方法<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to retrieve the key for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>若要检索的密钥。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref> that contains the key that is referenced in the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"> </xref> ，其中包含指定的密钥标识符子句中引用密钥。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数传递时未经初始化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when a key can be retrieved for the specified key identifier clause; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>当检索指定的密钥标识符子句中; 密钥否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to retrieve the security token that matches one of the key identifier clauses contained within the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 尝试检索与指定的密钥标识符中包含的密钥标识符子句之一相匹配的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The TryResolveToken and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> methods differ in what happens when the key identifier cannot be resolved to a security token.
trans-unit.target: TryResolveToken 和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>方法中的密钥标识符不能解析为安全令牌时，会发生什么情况的行为有所不同。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TryResolveToken method returns `false`, whereas the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: TryResolveToken 方法返回`false`，而<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>方法引发异常。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> to create a security token for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref>若要创建安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，它表示指定的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.target: keyIdentifieris .

trans-unit.source: Attempts to retrieve the security token that matches the specified key identifier clause.

trans-unit.source: The TryResolveToken and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> methods differ in what happens when the key identifier clause cannot be resolved to a security token.
trans-unit.target: TryResolveToken 和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>方法的行为有所不同无法将密钥标识符子句解析为安全令牌时，会发生什么情况。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.target: TryResolveToken 方法返回`false`，而<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>方法引发异常。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>若要创建安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: keyIdentifierClause is .
trans-unit.target: keyIdentifierClauseis .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to retrieve the security token that matches at least one of the key identifier clauses contained within the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，尝试检索与指定的密钥标识符中包含的密钥标识符子句中至少一个匹配的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The TryResolveTokenCore method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 调用 TryResolveTokenCore 方法<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> to create a security token for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref>若要创建安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，它表示指定的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数传递时未经初始化。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>当检索指定的密钥标识符; 的安全令牌否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to resolve the security token that matches the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，尝试解析与指定的密钥标识符子句相匹配的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The TryResolveTokenCore method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> methods.
